key.name: remove-lock-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Lock Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-logout-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Logout Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-suspend-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Suspend Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-power-button
key.summary: Turn ON if you wish to remove Power Off Item from system's menu.

key.name: show-gnome-tweaks
key.summary: Turn ON to show Gnome-Tweaks in the system's menu. (If Gnome-Tweaks is Installed..)
